onboarding-text: We are a company with innovative mobile solutions that make your life easier and complement it with digital benefits
go-mind-desc: A mobile application for conducting quizzes and publishing advertisements. An innovative approach: combining gaming and advertising using an internal currency.
main-function-1: An hourly quiz for users with points awarded.
main-function-2: The ability to publish ads through the payment of an internal currency («pears»).
legal-address: Legal Address: 37 K. Nuradilov St., Building 2, Room 8, v. Meskeryurt, Meskeryurtovskoye Rural Settlement, Shalinsky Municipal District, Chechen Republic, 366311, Russia
postal-address: Postal Address: 37 K. Nuradilov St., Building 2, v. Meskeryurt, Meskeryurtovskoye Rural Settlement, Shalinsky Municipal District, Chechen Republic, 366311, Russia
payments-1: Pears are the internal currency of the platform, which is used to purchase in-app advertisements and award rewards to quiz winners.
usage-feature-1: The pears spent on advertising are distributed among the quiz winners
usage-feature-2: The winners can withdraw the earned pennies by selling them to the platform at a set exchange rate
pears-purpose-2: Pears are used for the following purposes
pears-purpose-4: The reward for winning the quiz
pears-purpose-5: The possibility of selling pears to the platform at a fixed price (10 rubles for 1 pear)
pears-purpose-6: At the same time, all the pears spent on advertising are transferred to the winners of the quizzes. The winners can cash out their pears by selling them to the platform at the above price.
incorrect-email: You have entered an incorrect email address
logout-success: You have successfully logged out of your account
logout-error: Failed to log out of account
